test.name: 1.Validação das informações do curso de Data Analytics

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Select Frame
kw.doc: Sets frame identified by ``locator`` as the current frame.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Unselect Frame
kw.doc: Sets the main frame as the current frame.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Scroll Element Into View
kw.doc: Scrolls the element identified by ``locator`` into view.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Scroll Element Into View
kw.doc: Scrolls the element identified by ``locator`` into view.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: 1.Verificar se o subtitulo do curso corresponde a “Transforme grandes quantidades de dados em insights.”
Element Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Element 'xpath=//div[@id='__next']/div/main/section/div/div' contains text 'Transforme grandes quantidades de dados em insights'.

kw.name: 1.Verificar se a página contém o termo “manipulação e análise de dados”
Page Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.
kw.msg: Current page contains text 'manipulação e análise de dados'.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Scroll Element Into View
kw.doc: Scrolls the element identified by ``locator`` into view.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: 1.Validar se o valor do curso é “R$ 9.824,00”
Element Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
